description: For when Windows keeps breaking your window layout this remembers how its been and rearranges the windows when you log back in.

code:
file_path, _ = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(
    None, 'Import SessionRestore Data', module.path, 'JSON (*.json)')
if file_path:
    name = 'sr_windowlister'
    import a2util
    current_data = module.get_user_cfg().get(name, {})
    import_data = {}
    for size_key, size_data in a2util.json_read(file_path).items():
        try:
            x, y = map(int, size_key.split(','))
            import_data[size_key] = size_data
            print('importing "%s"' % str(size_key))
        except (ValueError, AttributeError):
            print('Skipping importing "%s"' % str(size_key))
    current_data.update(import_data)
    module.set_user_cfg({'name': name}, current_data)
    module.change()
    call_reload()
label: Import Settings

file_path, _ = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(
    None, 'Export SessionRestore Data', module.path, 'JSON (*.json)')
import a2util
if file_path:
    data = module.get_user_cfg().get('sr_windowlister')
    a2util.json_write(file_path, data)
